text: William Baldwin (31 January 1907 – 1982) was an English professional footballer. His clubs included Chesterfield, Oldham Athletic and Gillingham. He made 95 Football League appearances. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Footballers from Leigh, Greater Manchester Category:Association football forwards Category:English footballers Category:Gillingham F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Southport F.C. players Category:Barrow A.F.C. players Category:Crewe Alexandra F.C. players Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bill Baldwin (footballer)
